name: MY BABY!!!!!
description:
What will you do if your baby falls down a pit of circus swingers? Well not much other than wait for the circus swingers to throw and kick your baby back up to the surface as the swing around.

  • Press A or D to swing the circus members in either direction.
  • Red members grab the baby on contact and can throw the baby with Space.
  • Pink members kick baby on contact.
  • Can click the nodes of the circus members to toggle individual directions.

Assets Used

  • https://www.pngegg.com/en/png-bzzha
  • https://www.subpng.com/png-xnx88m/download.html
  • https://www.hiclipart.com/free-transparent-background-png-clipart-iwtdq
  • https://pngtree.com/freebackground/striped-retro-circus-background_1233711.html
  • https://pixabay.com/illustrations/panic-big-eyes-crooked-hands-1393619/
